metadata.subject: Re: Lawyer for Susan Rice: Obama administration 'justifiably concerned' about sharing intel with Trump team - POLITICO

relationships.description: Communicating about political strategy and legal considerations
Epstein suggesting ways to potentially avoid Mueller investigation through legal structures

analysis.purpose: To discuss political coalition building strategies and potential legal workarounds for campaign finance and investigation issues
analysis.significance: Shows coordination between Bannon and Epstein on political strategy and potential attempts to circumvent legal scrutiny

concerns: Suggestion to use religious organization structure to claim privilege against investigation

notable_quotes: "if you form a church you may be able to tell mueller you have a confession privelege. :)"
"need to understand flow of funds. . donor to campiagn c?s. does it have to go to campaign first. . does it have to go there at all etc."
red_flags: Discussion of potentially structuring entities to avoid legal scrutiny
Considering religious organization formation specifically for legal privilege purposes
Exploring campaign finance flow questions that may skirt regulations

blackmail_indicators.description: No evidence of blackmail, coercion, or leverage being used in this communication

evidence: Discussion of structuring entities to potentially avoid legal scrutiny
Exploring campaign finance flow questions that may skirt regulations
illegal_activity.description: The email chain shows discussions about potentially structuring campaign finance flows and creating religious organizations specifically to claim legal privilege against investigations, which could indicate planning of activities that might circumvent campaign finance laws or obstruct justice

details: Reference to POLITICO article about Susan Rice and Obama administration's concerns about sharing intelligence with Trump team

public_knowledge.context: This email exchange occurred during the Mueller investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election, when discussions about campaign finance and legal strategies were highly scrutinized

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Steve Bannon and Jeffrey Epstein discussing political coalition building strategies and exploring potential legal structures including forming a church to claim confession privilege against the Mueller investigation, along with questions about campaign finance flow regulations.
